EmailTemplate.subject: Do you want to be a Challenge Action Leader? Reply YES or NO!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
Congratulations on being selected to be a Challenge Action Leader for The Challenge Society's Youth Board in your local community. We recently sent you a letter outlining the responsibilities of the role, details for the training and asking you to confirm whether you would like to accept. If you have not received this letter in the post please let me know by 9am on Friday 14th October and I will email you a copy.
This is a fantastic opportunity which will look great on your CV, for you to represent the voice of your peers and work as a team to design and plan a fun community action event. We need to know asap if you would/would not like to accept so please reply by Friday 14th October at 9am, before we offer the position to someone else.
You will be comitting to two meetings a month and training in a couple of weeks. The training for these will be at the start of half term, the details for which were outlined in the letter. It is really important you attend this training if you would like to be on the Youth Board.
Please reply to me today!
All the best,
Helen (grads@the-challenge.org; 07432730486)
Helen Conacher Challenge Society Manager
